channel.title: Hotelling Model (Horizontal Differentiation) on Aldric Labarthe
channel.description: Recent content in Hotelling Model (Horizontal Differentiation) on Aldric Labarthe

item.title: A unified model of horizontal differentiation with general spaces and irrational consumers
item.description: This paper offers a novel theoretical framework for horizontal differentiation models, with Riemannian stochastic geometry.
